snippet.title: DARQ - Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/433550/DARQ/
Buy On GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/darq

WEBSITE: http://DarqGame.com
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/UnfoldGames
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/unfoldgames
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/UnfoldGames
PRESS KIT: http://darqgame.com/presskit.html
MERCHANDISE: https://teespring.com/stores/darq

DARQ is a psychological horror game that tells the story of Lloyd, a boy who becomes aware of the fact that he is dreaming. The dream quickly turns into a nightmare and all attempts to wake up end in failure. DARQ is launching on Steam on August 15. 

Art direction / Music: Wlad Marhulets
Logo Design: Kelsey Haley
Sound Design: Bjørn Jacobsen
Sound Mix: Adam Schmidt
Voice Over: Jaren Machado
